fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Loose Lips: The first time you whisper with someone, learn if they share the same faction as you (Uncertain). 
- Extort: Learn a Room last night. That room had a Chaos member in it (Susceptible). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Converse: Pick a player. Learn if they don’t win with at least 1 of their neighbors on the current phase’s playerlist. Cannot be someone next to you (Uncertain). [2 uses, 3 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Secrets: Pick a player. Learn if they have a private chat open (faction chat, trade, whispers, etc) at the end of the phase. [1 uses, Astral, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Tips: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
